name: Job Done!
description:
Congratulations on securing your position at █████████ incorporated!

Throughout your career you will be required to perform an array of menial tasks. 
Perform these tasks to the highest degree and you may find yourself  at the █████████ incorporated  corporate ladder!

  

On your first day as a valued █████████ incorporate employee, your first task is to press the RED BUTTON before you. Seems easy enough...right?

  • Interact: Left Click
  • Pause: ESC

Created for  #BrackeysGameJam
Assets Used: Link to pastebin
